page.title: 23A Change of Use for the Convent
page.content:
The last surviving member of the St Katherine's community died in 1998.

Parmoor is a Grade ll Listed Building which is now the Headquarters of the Sue Ryder Prayer Fellowship which was founded by Lady Ryder to be a " spiritual powerhouse " for the needs of others. Parmoor welcomes people from all walks of life and denominations , or none , for meetings, seminars and retreats in the spririt of ecumenism and reconciliation
Ray Jones
